summary:
As a Marketing Manager in the cross-media advertising measurement field, I thrive in building and growing marketing teams and brands from the ground up. My primary focus lies in devising growth strategies and overseeing their optimal operational implementation, by empowering my team with the right tools and context to reach our marketing and communications goals.

My passion for marketing stems from the thrill of running in-depth research to unearth hidden insights, allowing us to gain a better understanding of our audience and target them with precision. This not only enhances our targeting capabilities but also maximises our ROI, which is the ultimate goal of any marketing team.

With a strong background in digital marketing, I pride myself on my ability to leverage my hybrid marketing, PR and analytical expertise to develop and execute efficient marketing and communications strategies that drive business results.

projects.title: RAISING AWARENESS ABOUT THE DANGERS OF LIGHT POLLUTION IN BARCELONA
projects.description: Light pollution is a minimised, underrated, and understudied modern-age climate issue. It affects all cities worldwide, with no exception. Yet, its effects on the population and the ecosystem have not been as publicised or announced by respective municipal governments and media outlets, as other climate change problems. However, according to the relevant scientific literature, an associative and non-causality correlation between indoor and outdoor artificial light at night (light pollution) and numerous diseases and health conditions (many of them caused by sleeping disorders), have been spotted. The city of Barcelona, considered as being one of Europe's top smart cities and tech and innovation powerhouses, is also affected by these problems. Its citizens and natural ecosystem have seemingly been undergoing (based on the existing technological and scientific research papers) a set of poorly-addressed and insufficient street lighting policy measures which are continually endangering their health and optimal well-being. In this dissertation, we review the negative effects of light pollution at night for humankind's health, the ecosystem, and the kinds of smart street lighting measures, like Narrow-band amber LEDs, that are available for cities like Barcelona, and which can revert the light pollution environmental crisis.

projects.title: RECOMMENDATIONS TOWARDS THE DEVELOPMENT AND OPTIMIZATION OF AN ASTROPRODUCT AND ASTRODESTINATION
projects.description: This research was conducted as a consequence of wanting to underline the importance of a growing travel trend, astrotourism, and particularly to manifest a series of measures and actions necessary when developing this interesting but understudied tourism niche. However, there is still no standardized form to define this sustainable tourism leisure practice, (spotted all over the world under various forms). Consequently, a thorough literature analysis and an investigation of the main astrotourism definitions provided by the most relevant authors has been developed, prompting the creation of a unified definition of the term astrotourism, as well as one for the two other key concepts: astrotourist, and astrodestination (fundamental to understanding the meaning of this tourism practice). Thanks to an elaborate analysis of the present situation through a list of case studies, key information on existing astrotourism destination has been spotted. Concluding in the generation of a list of recommendations for tourism agents to develop and optimize an astroproduct or astrodestination, whilst following tourism sustainable goals as a core asset.

courses.name: Google Digital Garage - Fundamentals of Digital Marketing

profile_positions.description:
Beatgrid is a Dutch fast-growing adtech company that leverages its own proprietary ACR technology to provide a revolutionary single-source and person-level cross-media measurement solution. This allows global media buyers and planners to measure their campaigns' unduplicated TV and cross-media ad R&F, brand lift, and retail footfall lift with accuracy.

My work revolves around building and managing our marketing team. I am responsible for devising growth strategies and overseeing their optimal operational implementation to position Beatgrid as the global go-to cross-media measurement currency for advertising effectiveness.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:

Assisting the Ajuntament de Ginestar in the execution of the tourism project by empowering the local community with the digital tools and knowledge needed to implement the above-mentioned strategy autonomously.
